languages.text: "Кажется, я все же научилась различать оттенки чувств мон-кай. Это было похоже на гнев, но на самом деле это — отчаяние. Ей страшно. И одиноко".
"I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."
languages.original_text: "Кажется, я все же научилась различать оттенки чувств мон-кай. Это было похоже на гнев, но на самом деле это — отчаяние. Ей страшно. И одиноко".

traits.locale_text: "I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."

languages.text: “我已经开始学会分辨猴子不同的情绪了。她看起来非常愤怒，但实际上更贴近于绝望。她很害怕，也很孤独。”
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."

traits.locale_text: “我已经开始学会分辨猴子不同的情绪了。她看起来非常愤怒，但实际上更贴近于绝望。她很害怕，也很孤独。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイの感情の濃淡がわかるようになってきた。今のは怒りのように見えたが、実際は絶望に近かった。彼女は恐怖を感じている。そして孤独も」
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイの感情の濃淡がわかるようになってきた。今のは怒りのように見えたが、実際は絶望に近かった。彼女は恐怖を感じている。そして孤独も」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Empiezo a distinguir los diferentes tonos de las emociones de los mon-keigh. Eso parecía ira, pero está más cerca de la desesperación. Siente miedo. Y soledad».
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."

traits.locale_text: «Empiezo a distinguir los diferentes tonos de las emociones de los mon-keigh. Eso parecía ira, pero está más cerca de la desesperación. Siente miedo. Y soledad».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je commence à mieux percevoir les différentes nuances émotionnelles des mon-keigh. Cette apparente colère était en réalité plus proche du désespoir. Elle a peur, et elle se sent seule. »
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."

traits.locale_text: « Je commence à mieux percevoir les différentes nuances émotionnelles des mon-keigh. Cette apparente colère était en réalité plus proche du désespoir. Elle a peur, et elle se sent seule. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich beginne langsam, verschiedene Nuancen der Emotionen von Chem-Pan-Sey zu verstehen. Sie klang irgendwie wütend, aber eigentlich hat die reinste Verzweiflung aus ihr gesprochen. Sie fürchtet sich. Und sie fühlt sich alleine."
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."

traits.locale_text: "Ich beginne langsam, verschiedene Nuancen der Emotionen von Chem-Pan-Sey zu verstehen. Sie klang irgendwie wütend, aber eigentlich hat die reinste Verzweiflung aus ihr gesprochen. Sie fürchtet sich. Und sie fühlt sich alleine."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Mon-keigh duygularının farklı tonlarını ayırt etmeye başlıyorum. Bu, öfke gibi dursa da aslında umutsuzluğa daha yakın. Korkuyor ve yalnız hissediyor."
languages.original_text: "I am beginning to discern the different shades of mon-keigh emotions. That seemed like anger, but it was actually closer to despair. She feels afraid. And alone."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh duygularının farklı tonlarını ayırt edebilmeye başlıyorum. Bu, öfke gibi görünüyordu ancak aslında umutsuzluğa daha yakındı. Korku hissediyor. Ve yalnızlık."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
